name: A friend called Loneliness
description:
From the developers of THE WITCH OF ERAST and their first commercial release THE ADVENTURES OF SAM CARLISLE: THE HUNT FOR THE LOST TREASURE in their first 3D release, A friend called Loneliness. A third-person exploration game centered around a social problem of Loneliness. You play as a young women to try and fight the daemon in side of her. Explore this beautiful stylized island and uncover what the true meaning of loneliness is. 

 For fans that love The First Tree, Gone Home and Death Stranding.

MINIMUM:

  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD A6 
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 460 / AMD 4870 DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

RECOMMENDED:

  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD FX
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 680 / AMD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
